Articles.Content:
I just started ksp and struggle in training mission 5 - i dont have a LV-45T in the inventory to complete the training - have deleted game, reinstalled it - no changes ...

Help ...

Edited August 16, 2021 by Kerbal Fronk

1.12.2 revamped the LV-T45 Swivel and Reliant engines, and like with other part revamps the old parts were hidden but are still in the game files to prevent craft from breaking. Sort by part manufacturers in the advanced mode in the VAB with the arrow in the top left of the part menu, and the old Swivel should be somewhere in there.

 

Edited August 16, 2021 by Stamp20

Sorting by manufacturer (Jeb's) does appear to work, as does sorting by tech level (2).

 

And yes, the advanced construction training mission is bugged since you don't get an LV-T45 in the obvious place.

Edited August 17, 2021 by UmbralRaptor

On 8/16/2021 at 6:58 PM, Stamp20 said:

1.12.2 revamped the LV-T45 Swivel and Reliant engines, and like with other part revamps the old parts were hidden but are still in the game files to prevent craft from breaking. Sort by part manufacturers in the advanced mode in the VAB with the arrow in the top left of the part menu, and the old Swivel should be somewhere in there.

 

Thank you so much dude.

I was struggling with this since last night, the tutorials repeatedly tell you to add engines that don't exist in standard view.
Devs, please fix this. Horrible first-time user experience.
I can confirm that this is still broken (and needs the same workaround) in 1.12.3
The training missions were a great idea, but they need ongoing love to not completely make a bad impression on new players who are exactly the people who'd be running them
If anyone else stumbles on this thread because their tutorials are broken, use this to fix them:

On 3/14/2022 at 11:20 PM, darthgently said:

The training missions were a great idea, but they need ongoing love to not completely make a bad impression on new players who are exactly the people who'd be running them

Which is why I wrote the TutorialFixes mod
